message.name: HTTP_400_SEARCH_ADDRESS_QUERY_PARAMS_NOT_VALID
message.locale: Postal Code should be entered for Address Search.

message.name: HTTP_400_VALIDATE_ADDRESS_QUERY_PARAMS_NOT_VALID
message.locale: Address text, province and city are required to validate an address.

message.name: BDM_ERR_WS_ADDRESS_INVALID_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The address as entered is not valid according to the address validation tool (WSAddress REST API)

message.name: BDM_REST_API_ERR_MALFORMED_URL_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The URL for %1s REST API is incorrect

message.name: BDM_REST_API_ERR_IO_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The %1s REST API cannot be accessed

message.name: BDM_REST_API_ERR_EXCEPTION
message.locale: Error occurred when accessing %1s REST API

message.name: BDM_ERR_DECD_GUID_NOT_POPULATED_EXCEPTION
message.locale: Error occurred, GUID is not populated

message.name: BDM_ERR_GCNOTIFY_MALFORMED_URL_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The URL for GCNotify is incorrect

message.name: BDM_ERR_GCNOTIFY_IO_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The GCNotify REST API cannot be accessed

message.name: BDM_ERR_GCNOTIFY_EXCEPTION
message.locale: Error occurred when accessing GCNotify REST API

message.name: BDM_WSADDRESS_SEARCH_BY_POSTALCODE_ERR_504_GATEWAY_TIMEOUT_EXCEPTION
message.locale: We are temporarily experiencing technical difficulties. Manually enter the address to proceed.

message.name: BDM_WSADDRESS_VALIDATE_ERR_504_GATEWAY_TIMEOUT_EXCEPTION
message.locale: We are temporarily experiencing technical difficulties and the address cannot be validated. Review the address and continue to the next step to proceed.

message.name: BDM_WSADDRESS_SEARCH_BY_POSTALCODE_REST_API_ERR_EXCEPTION
message.locale: Error occurred when accessing %1s REST API. Additional details : Error Code %2s and Error description : %3s

message.name: BDM_WSADDRESS_SEARCH_BY_POSTALCODE_REST_API_ERR_EXCEPTION_INVALID_ADDRESS_SEARCH_DATA
message.locale: Below address data does not appear to be valid. To make corrections select 'Search' or "Add New' to manually enter the address to proceed.

message.name: BDM_WSADDRESS_SEARCH_BY_POSTALCODE_REST_API_ERR_EXCEPTION_INVALID_ADDRESS
message.locale: Below is the address that was entered. It does not appear to be a valid address. To make a correction, select ‘Back’. To confirm the address displayed, select ‘Save’.

message.name: BDM_REQUEST_FOR_CALLBACK_API_EMAIL_LENGTH_ABOVE_LIMIT
message.locale: Email address cannot exceed 254 chars

message.name: BDM_REQUEST_FOR_CALLBACK_API_INVALID_EMAIL
message.locale: Please enter valid Email address

message.name: BDM_REQUEST_FOR_CALLBACK_API_INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER
message.locale: Please enter valid PhoneNumber

message.name: BDM_REQUEST_FOR_CALLBACK_API_PENDING_REQUEST_ALREADY_USER
message.locale: There exists a pending call-back request already for this User

message.name: BDM_REQUEST_FOR_CALLBACK_API_PENDING_REQUEST_ALREADY_PHONENUMBER
message.locale: There exists a pending call-back request already for this Telephone Number

message.name: BDM_REQUEST_FOR_CALLBACK_API_FIELD_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: %1s is Mandatory

message.name: BDM_ERR_TAX_SLIP_INVALID_STATUS
message.locale: Cannot process tax slip with status 'Issued'

message.name: BDM_ERR_AUTHENTICATION_KEY_DECRYPTION
message.locale: Error occured during decryption process of authentication header key

message.name: HTTP_404_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND_SINERROR_DOJ
message.locale: SIN received from DOJ is not found.
